conclusion: Points A, B, and C are vertices of an equilateral triangle in a vacuum.
Equal-magnitude like charges are placed at points A and B.
Electric-field strength at the center O of the triangle is E.
Electric potential at the center O is not given.
An equal-magnitude opposite-sign charge is placed at point C.
Electric potential at infinity is taken as 0.
Electric-field magnitude at the center O after the third, opposite-sign charge is placed is 3E.
Electric potential at the center O is 0 with V = 0 at infinity.
